SELECT b.id id, b.subclass_code subclassCode, b.item_code itemCode, b.item_name itemName, b.item_comment itemComment, b.data_type dataType, b.data_length dataLength, b.data_primarykey dataPrimarykey, b.data_nullable dataNullable, b.data_value_source dataValueSource, b.data_explain dataExplain, b.data_referenced dataReferenced, b.selectable selectable, o.code_name subclassName FROM info_datastandard_item b inner join info_datastandard_org o on b.subclass_code= o.code and o.node_type = 3 where 1=1

and b.subclass_code in ( select t3.code from info_datastandard_org t2 inner join info_datastandard_org t3 on t2.code = t3.parent_code where t2.code= #{code} )
and b.subclass_code = #{code}
and (item_name like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') or item_comment like CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%') )
